pageTitle: Prime Minister Justin Trudeau speaks with the President of the United States of America, Donald Trump | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Prime Minister Justin Trudeau spoke today with United States President Donald Trump. The two leaders discussed the United States’ Section 232 tariffs on steel and aluminum and Canada’s retaliatory tariffs. 

The two leaders also discussed relations with China, uranium, and the new NAFTA.

The Prime Minister and President agreed to keep in close touch on these and other important issues.
